### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

### Pipe network
Consists of the following pipe groups:
- PipeGroup (fluid system 35257, position -18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system 35260, position -12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system 35263, position -9.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system 35268, position -10.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system 35269, position -6.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to set research that is already completed
- Ensure to check the current research status before attempting to set a new research. If a technology is already researched, select a different technology that is available.

### Errors when trying to research a technology without meeting prerequisites
- Verify the prerequisites for the technology you wish to research. Ensure you have researched all required technologies before attempting to research the next one.
